line.comment: * Returns "available", "unlocked", "disabled", "max" or an int from 2 to 10 representing the required level.
* Zero Hour adds Perks with dependencies
* Herobetty 5.4: Cleaned up the code. Removed if-else redundancies for Population stability (formerly Triple Population Growth), no food, and tax.
* If player joined OCV, player cannot have pirate contract (Xenon/OCV don't make (new) deals with pirates).
* Tax, reputation, food, and unfortunate events are disabled as it's redundant in an OCV playthrough.
* Mordan3. Exceeded number of jump stations.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Fixed - added !unlocked check.
* Add-Ons 1.1: Terraforming specialist is locked if there are fewer than 3 planets in the sector.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Terraforming efficiency perks have tiered requirements.
* Each efficiency perk (except tier 1) requires the perk before it.
* Tiers 1/2/3/4 require 3/7/12/18 planets terraformed.
* TE4 requires ALL terraforming-related perks unlocked and Capital Shipyard.
* TE1: 3+ terraformed planets.
* TE2: 7+ terraformed planets and TE1.
* TE3: 12+ terraformed planets and TE2.
* TE4:
* - 18+ terraformed planets
* - All terraforming-related perks (TE1-3 + Terraforming specialist)
* - Outpost must be a Capital Shipyard, not a regular Outpost.
* ======= ANY PERKS BELOW ARE DISABLED IF THE ONLY CONDITION IS JOINING THE OCV =======
* Pirate contract
* Reduced upkeep for newly built ships.
* Reduced upkeep for docked ships.
* Insurance Policy
* Friendly neighbor
* Interorbital storage

sval.val: Returns "available", "unlocked", "disabled", "max" or an int from 2 to 10 representing the required level.
Zero Hour adds Perks with dependencies
Herobetty 5.4: Cleaned up the code. Removed if-else redundancies for Population stability (formerly Triple Population Growth), no food, and tax.
If player joined OCV, player cannot have pirate contract (Xenon/OCV don't make (new) deals with pirates).
Tax, reputation, food, and unfortunate events are disabled as it's redundant in an OCV playthrough.
Mordan3. Exceeded number of jump stations.
Add-Ons 1.1: Terraforming specialist is locked if there are fewer than 3 planets in the sector.
Add-Ons 1.2: Terraforming efficiency perks have tiered requirements.
Each efficiency perk (except tier 1) requires the perk before it.
TE4 requires ALL terraforming-related perks unlocked and Capital Shipyard.
- Outpost must be a Capital Shipyard, not a regular Outpost.
======= ANY PERKS BELOW ARE DISABLED IF THE ONLY CONDITION IS JOINING THE OCV =======
Reduced upkeep for newly built ships.
